players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. We need to vote her out to win."
You: "Charlie, you're wrong! I'm a villager, and you're just trying to frame me. We should investigate you instead."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of Diana? That seems suspicious."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the real detective, you should have investigated Diana last night since she was the most likely kill target. Your story doesn't add up."
Charlie: "Bob, my investigation was based on initial suspicions, and it proved Alice is the mafioso. We can't afford to doubt now—vote her out to win for the town."
